com.impetus.labs.korus.addons.constructs.pipeline
Class PipelineTask

java.lang.Object
  com.impetus.labs.korus.core.process.BaseProcess
      com.impetus.labs.korus.addons.constructs.pipeline.PipelineTask

public abstract class PipelineTask
extends BaseProcess

Only those classes can be added to the Pipeline which inherit this class

 void service(RawMessage msg)

Method Detail

service

public void service(RawMessage msg)
Override the service(rawMessage) method of BaseProcess so that classes extending PipelineTask implement the service() method, thereby suppressing the use of service(rawMessage) method.

Specified by:
service in class BaseProcess

service

public abstract void service()
service() method should be implemented by all Pipeline Tasks

getInputQueue

public PipelineQueue<java.lang.Object> getInputQueue()
To get the inputQueue of the pipelineTask.

Returns:
the inputQueue of the pipelineTask.

setInputQueue

public void setInputQueue(PipelineQueue<java.lang.Object> inputQueue)
Sets the input queue of this pipeline task. It is a queue which takes the output of a previous pipeline task as its input.

Parameters:
inputQueue - An Object

getOutputQueue

public PipelineQueue<java.lang.Object> getOutputQueue()
Gets the outputQueue of the pipelineTask. The ouputQueue of this Task is the input Queue of the next class.

Returns:
A KorusQueue Object
